name: h Simply Go
description:
Objective of the game is move your items from your corner to opponent corner. Items can move only forward horizontal or vertical directions. Items also can jump one over another. If you are able to jump over opponent items you ought to do. If you jump once, you must complete all your possible jumps by this item. Game completes when one of players have not more moves.
That player wins who have moved more items by game completion.

FEATURES:
• Brilliant quality HD graphics, animations & sound effects
• Graphics acceleration
• Play with your friends or with "CYBERMIND"!
• Game Center integration
• Worldwide leaderboard
• Multiplayer
• Autosave/restoring
• Energy saving system
